Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hello! How can I assist you today with News Break? If you have any questions or need help, feel free to ask!
my ads are not running yet

I'm sorry to hear that your ads aren't running yet. Let's figure this out together! Could you please provide me with some details about your campaign, such as the start date, bidding type, and any recent changes you've made in the last 72 hours? This information will help me assist you better.
i started my ads on 23 apr

Thanks for sharing the start date. Since your ads have been pending for a while, could you let me know if your account is new and whether it has been verified? If not, you might need to provide some verification details. Here's what you'll need to do:
Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification and include:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we'll conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. Let me know if you need further assistance!

Great, since your account is already verified, let's check a few more things. Could you confirm the bidding type and any targeting or budget settings you've applied? Also, have there been any recent changes in the last 72 hours that might affect your ad delivery?
i want to chat with live agent

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If your issue requires further assistance, I can guide you on how to contact our support team via email.
